        public java.lang.String getQuestion(Symbol wantedSymbol)
        Description copied from interface: IExerciseMode
        This method returns the given Symbol in the format relative to the one needed for the question. Ex : English to Japanese == Question : A and Anwser : あ.

      • createSymbolFromAnswer

        public Symbol createSymbolFromAnswer(java.lang.String answer)
        Description copied from interface: IExerciseMode
        This method returns a Symbol containing only the parameter corresponding to the needed format for answer It is a bit messy, but this helps keeping polymorphism work when using solver. Ex : English to Japanese == new Symbol(null, answer, null, null, null, null).
        Specified by:
        createSymbolFromAnswer in interface IExerciseMode
        Parameters:

        Returns:
